content: Can you provide the name of a professional basketball team from the United States that has won at least one NBA championship in the last 10 years and has an average annual attendance of over 20,000 fans per game?

The Golden State Warriors are a professional basketball team from the United States that fits your criteria. They have won multiple NBA championships in the last 10 years (2015, 2017, 2018, and 2022) and have consistently high attendance figures, often averaging over 20,000 fans per game at their home venue, the Chase Center.
